description:
Today, Pascal-sensei tells the class how he began his journey as a teacher.
Then why is he talking about synchronized swimming?
Later, the award winners for the best students in 4 categories are announced. 
Who will win the ultimate award?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pascal-sensei Hajimete Jugyou / Perfect Plate / Saiyuushuu Seito: Dai Happyou!
Pascal-sensei`s First Class / Perfect Plate / Announcement of the Absolutely Best Student!
パスカル先生初めての授業 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 最優秀生徒 大発表!
